recipesJson.name: The Average
recipesJson.author: HerrHut
recipesJson.description:
I got nosy yesterday and came up with the idea to mix some of the top ATF flavors with their average percentages.  Luckily I had the first 6 in my stash so I mixed it up and it turned out pretty tasty.  Tastes like custard with a dash of custard.

So here are the top 6 ATF Flavors with their average percentages as of 23-Feb-2017.

Enjoy :)
